body_html:
I just tested with the standard pip-installed tensorflow-gpu, it has the same behavior.

  • TensorFlow installed from: pip, tensorflow-gpu
  • TensorFlow version: v1.12.0-0-ga6d8ffae09, 1.12.0
  • Python version: 3.6.7
  • CUDA/cuDNN version: 10.0, Driver Version: 410.73

body:
I just tested with the standard pip-installed `tensorflow-gpu`, it has the same behavior.

- TensorFlow installed from: **pip, tensorflow-gpu**
- TensorFlow version: **v1.12.0-0-ga6d8ffae09, 1.12.0**
- Python version: **3.6.7**
- CUDA/cuDNN version: **10.0, Driver Version: 410.73**
